title: Document per-bead commit cadence in AGENTS.md
Scaffold CourseGen PoC repo structure and vendor deps
Author handcrafted Database Systems knowledge assets
Wire CodeAct world-model tools to adapter
Migrate Pydantic validators to v2 style
Implement run_poc CLI orchestrator and evaluation hooks

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: Added ccopilot.core + pipeline scaffolding and unit tests while waiting for apps/** reservations; ready to integrate once surfaces free.

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: Reviewed scaffolding from other agents, added world_model storage guards + regression tests to avoid sqlite path errors while apps/** remains reserved.

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: Implemented ccopilot.pipeline runtime + tests so run_poc can generate stub course_plan/lecture/eval artifacts without touching apps/**; ready to swap in RLM once scaffolding frees up.

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: CLI now supports --ingest-world-model (calls scripts.ingest_handcrafted via bootstrap) and tests cover the flag with realistic datasets; pipeline runtime loads snapshot metadata and provenance logs the ingest step.

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: Moving on to orchestrator integration with the newly ingested world modelâ€”next chunk will expose dataset summary + real concept IDs in the manifest and hook CodeAct/world_model adapters into the pipeline.

comments.author: kylepham
comments.text: Fixed world_model storage gap uncovered during review: added execute() so adapters can insert claims, plus regression tests (tests/test_world_model_adapter.py) to cover record_claim/fetch_concept_tree.

title: Limit pytest discovery to repo tests (exclude vendor deps)
